channel.title: Azure DevOps on Mart's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Azure DevOps on Mart's blog

item.title: Migrating Classic Azure DevOps Releases to YAML Pipelines
item.description: Migrate your classic releases to YAML pipelines in Azure DevOps with our comprehensive guide. Streamline your deployment process today!

item.title: Golden Tips To Leave Companies Without A Nasty Smell
item.description: Leave no technical debt, clean up after yourself when leaving a company. The first impression is just as important as the last impression.

item.title: Efficiently use Outlook Rules to Delete Azure DevOps Email Clutter
item.description: Are you also annoyed by the number of emails generated by Azure DevOps? Learn how I fixed email overdose using an Outlook rule.

item.title: Efficiently Git Clone All Repositories from Azure DevOps using PowerShell: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: Learn how to efficiently clone all Git repos in Azure DevOps with our comprehensive consulting guide. Streamline your development workflow today!
